verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] ordered the Department of Energy to use emergency federal authority to prevent the closing of old noncompetitive coal and nuclear power plants by requiring wholesale markets to buy power from the old plants . FirstEnergy Solutions in April asked the DOE to intervene , arguing that its nuclear and coal plants have long - term fuel supplies on site , unlike gas turbine competitors , and are therefore necessary for national security . FES on Friday said the federal intervention was not enough and would also need a state - created rate increase .

FES on Friday said the federal intervention was not enough and would also need a state - created rate increase .
